title: "Too Damn Perfect": Conspiracy Theories Surface After Trump Rally Shooting
content: As US law enforcement officials continue to determine the motive behind the 20-year-old shooting at Donald Trump, the word 'Staged' became a trend on social media in the country, within minutes after the fatal attack.

title: Trump's Makeover To Convention Speech After Assassination Attempt
content: Donald Trump's convention speech will now focus on unity - and not aimed at President Joe Biden's policies - after the assassination attempt that he believes has changed the election discourse.

title: Political Implications Of Trump Assassination Bid For US Amid Uncertainty

title: FBI Probing Trump Rally Shooting As Potential "Domestic Terrorism" Act
content: The gunman who shot at former president Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday appears to have acted alone, said the FBI, which is probing the incident as a potential "domestic terrorism" act.
summary: The gunman who shot at former president Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday appears to have acted alone, said the FBI, which is probing the incident as a potential "domestic terrorism" act.

title: "Something Triggered That...": What Trump Attacker's Former Teacher Said
content: The portrait pieced together so far of the 20-year-old nursing home aide who allegedly tried to assassinate Donald Trump at an election rally reveals frustratingly little about why he would make such an attempt - or how he managed to come so close.

title: "So Frightening": Photographer Who Captured Bullet That Hit Trump's Ear
content: The moment a bullet grazed the ear of former US president Donald Trump during an assassination attempt on him at a rally in US's Pennsylvania was captured by a New York Times photographer.

title: Investment Giant BlackRock Pulls Ad Featuring Trump Rally Shooter
content: Thomas Matthew Crooks, the 20-year-old who shot at former president Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania, had briefly appeared in a 2022 advertisement for BlackRock Inc, the world's largest money manager.

title: Global Markets Ramp Up The 'Trump Trade' After Assassination Attempt

title: Trump Rally Shooting Changes Biden's Plan To Revive Presidential Campaign

title: 1st Photo Of Thomas Matthew Crooks, 20-Year-Old "Loner" Who Shot At Trump

title: Trump Reaches Milwaukee For Republican Convention After Assassination Bid
content: Donald Trump arrived on Sunday in Milwaukee, where he will be formally nominated as the Republican presidential candidate later this week after surviving an assassination attempt that aggravated an already bitter U.S. political divide.

title: "Trump Rally Shooting Calls On Us To Take Step Back": Biden In Rare Address

title: What Melania Trump Said On Assassination Attempt On Husband Donald Trump

title: "Time To Cool It Down": Biden Addresses US After Trump Assassination Bid

title: Trump Arrives For Republican Convention Day After Assassination Attempt
content: Former US president Donald Trump landed in Milwaukee on Sunday for the Republican National Convention, a little more than 24 hours after he was wounded in a failed assassination attempt, according to his son Eric Trump.

title: Trump Assassination Attempt Being Probed As Domestic Terrorism Act: FBI
